newsitem.title: SPAIN: One dead, 41 injured as bus overturns in Spain.
newsitem.headline: One dead, 41 injured as bus overturns in Spain.

text.p: One person died and 41 were injured when a coach carrying a tour group of elderly people crashed in southwest Spain on Sunday, local media reported.
The 50 predominantly Portuguese passengers were en route to Lisbon from northeastern Spain when the bus hit a barrier in the centre of the highway and overturned, reports said.
The coach belonged to Portuguese company Pima Tours.
